attributes.additional_details:
A lot of gay, bi, lesbian and straight people are in polyamorous relationships (where they are coupled with two or more people at the same time) in the UK. I am probably not the only person who thinks that this is greedy, and doesn't give single people like me a chance. What's worse is that people are petitioning to make polygamous marriages legal.

I am writing this petition because I would like the government to make polyamorous relationships illegal.
